text: Their six children — biological and adopted — have always been at the centre of their lives. Who can forget that they were allowed to customise their mother's Versace wedding veil with the sort of doodles most parents confine to the fridge door. Then there were their parents'repeated pronouncements about the wedding in August 2014 being largely motivated by a desire to make their much - loved brood happy.
